neighborhood_overview: Close to Starbucks, Dunkin Donuts, many restaurants, delis, grocery stores and nightlife. There are several parks nearby. Charles River is a 1/4 of a mile away.

The space
Room has a 5 star hotel feel. Modern, bright, clean and airy cozy, comfortable room. Queen size bed with black out curtains and blinds., Free fast wifi. Work station, cable/smart TV.
Conveniently located in a quiet, safe, residential neighborhood close to colleges, Fenway, TD Garden and downtown Boston

Guest access
Guests have access to the kitchenette and driveway.
